_source.text: Add in a better-than-ever Howard, healthy Jameer Nelson at the point, and the shooting guard combo of J.J Redick and Jason Richardson and just maybe we have something special here.

text: Add in a **better**-**than**-ever Howard, healthy Jameer Nelson at the point, and the shooting guard combo
of J.J Redick and **Jason** **Richardson** and just maybe we have something special here.

_source.text: 37. John Henderson, DT, Jaguars: Henderson played better than Stroud in 2005 and should have been in the Pro Bowl.

text: 37. **John** **Henderson**, DT, Jaguars: Henderson played **better** **than** Stroud in 2005 and should have been in the Pro Bowl.
